value.name: Woman screams as man attempts to steal her car at fuel station
value.description: A SERIAL offender with an “atrocious” criminal history has again been jailed after he attempted to enter a woman’s car while she was refuelling at a Townsville service station.

value.name: 50 people indicted in Butler and Warren counties
value.description: Grand juries, which meet in secret, review criminal charges brought by police and prosecutors and investigate possible criminal behavior. The proceedings are usually one-sided because the accused is not present and witnesses are not cross-examined.

video.name: 50 people indicted in Butler and Warren counties

value.name: How a Genetic Trait in Black People Can Give the Police Cover
value.description: But after sickled cells were found during the autopsy, the coroner said Lucas would not have died were it not for the trait, Dr. James Bowman, a pathologist who participated in the hearing, wrote in an academic article years later. The death was deemed ...
